data.title: Encounter with Tiber by Buzz Aldrin and John Barnes, Signed First Edition, 1996 by Buzz Aldrin and John Barnes: Very Good Hardcover (1996) 1st Edition, Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Warner Books - 1996 - Condition: Very Good - Presented is the first edition of Buzz Aldrin's ﻿Encounter with Tiber﻿, which he wrote in conjunction with John Barnes. The first edition book was published out of New York in 1996 and includes Buzz Aldrin's signature on the title page. The book also includes color photographs throughout. The copy is in very good condition with no visible wear or significant stains. The original dust jacket is in very good condition with vibrant colors. - Encounter with Tiber by Buzz Aldrin and John Barnes, Signed First Edition, 1996

Terms of Sale:

TERMS OF SERVICE

OVERVIEW

This website is operated by Great Republic. Throughout the site, the terms ?we?, ?us? and ?our? refer to Great Republic. Great Republic offers this website, including all information, tools and services available from this site to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies and notices stated here.

By visiting our site and/ or purchasing something from us, you engage in our ?Service? and agree to be bound by the following terms and...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Our trained staff prepare, package, and ship all items bought online or in-store. We package framed items securely and safely to avoid damage during the shipping process. Our shipping rates are inclusive of specialty packaging for these fragile items, such as art boxes, and insurance during shipping. If damage occurs during shipment, please contact us at headquarters@great-republic.com and we will assist you in either replacing the damaged item, fixing it, or returning it for a full refund.

Items are shipped with Standard Ground via FedEx or UPS. Please allow 1-3 days for handling and 5-7 days for domestic shipping time.

Please be aware that additional fees may apply after the order is processed to accommodate international shipping insurance or handling, based on a case by case basis. The customer will be responsible for taxes and duties to be paid on the item upon its arrival in their home country.

Items are shipped with International Economy via FedEx or UPS. Please allow 1-3 days for handling. Shipping times will vary by destination.
